# textDroppableView(_:dropSessionDidEnd:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the drop session has ended.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func textDroppableView(_ textDroppableView: any UIView & UITextDroppable, dropSessionDidEnd session: any UIDropSession)
```

## Parameters

- **textDroppableView**: The text view that received the drop activity.
- **session**: The drop session that has ended.

## Discussion

You implement this method if your delegate needs to do additional cleanup after the drop session has ended.

## Handling drop session notifications

- **textDroppableView(_:dropSessionDidEnter:)**: Tells the delegate that the user has moved the drag items into the coordinate system of the text view.
- **textDroppableView(_:dropSessionDidExit:)**: Tells the delegate that the user has moved the drag items out of the text view’s coordinate system.
- **textDroppableView(_:dropSessionDidUpdate:)**: Tells the delegate that the drop session has been updated.
